name: light game
description:
Take a deep breath and look into the lights.

Take your time and click into the lights.

Every 5 minutes, a new pattern rewards your patience.

~~~~

Controls

  • Played entirely with mouse... and time
  • Press S to take a screenshot
  • You can resize the window with 1, 2, or 3 on your keyboard (not in web version)
  • Delete savefile and start over by holding Shift+D+L (careful with that!)

~~~~

Hi there! This is my Christmas gift to you. Every year, I try to make a tiny game for Christmas. This one I did for me; you probably won't like it. It is intended that you leave it open on the side as you do other things. At least that's how I play it.

Vaguely inspired by Vesper5 and by my new lava lamp.

See ya!

—narF, Dec 2017
